languages.text: {n}Рыжая бровь чуть поднимается — как вам кажется, одобрительно. Не отрываясь от еды, мужчина кивает вам. Подобное внимание — высокая честь для обычного человека.{/n}
{n}A red brow quirks upward slightly — in approval, it seems. Without breaking off from his meal, he nods at you. For an ordinary human, such a show of regard is a high honour.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Рыжая бровь чуть поднимается — как вам кажется, одобрительно. Не отрываясь от еды, мужчина кивает вам. Подобное внимание — высокая честь для обычного человека.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A red brow quirks upward slightly — in approval, it seems. Without breaking off from his meal, he nods at you. For an ordinary human, such a show of regard is a high honour. He gives you another nod, graciously granting you the right to rise.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}A red brow quirks upward slightly — in approval, it seems. Without breaking off from his meal, he nods at you. For an ordinary human, such a show of regard is a high honour. He gives you another nod, graciously granting you the right to rise.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}A red brow quirks upward slightly — in approval, it seems. Without breaking off from his meal, he nods at you. For an ordinary human, such a show of regard is a high honour. He gives you another nod, graciously granting you the right to rise.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}A red brow quirks upward slightly — in approval, it seems. Without breaking off from his meal, he nods at you. For an ordinary human, such a show of regard is a high honour.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}他红色的眉毛微微扬了扬，似乎带着赞许的意味。他并没有停止狼吞虎咽，而是朝你点了点头。对普通人而言，这样的举动代表着相当程度的荣誉。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A red brow quirks upward slightly — in approval, it seems. Without breaking off from his meal, he nods at you. For an ordinary human, such a show of regard is a high honour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他红色的眉毛微微扬了扬，似乎带着赞许的意味。他并没有停止狼吞虎咽，而是朝你点了点头。对普通人而言，这样的举动代表着相当程度的荣誉。随后，他再次向你点点头，慷慨地允许你站起身来。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}赤髪の眉がかすかに上にあがった。悪い気はしないのだろう。彼は肉を食らい続けながらこちらを見てうなずく。普通の人間に対してこのように敬意を払うのは、かなり名誉なことだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A red brow quirks upward slightly — in approval, it seems. Without breaking off from his meal, he nods at you. For an ordinary human, such a show of regard is a high honour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}赤髪の眉がかすかに上にあがった。悪い気はしないのだろう。彼は肉を食らい続けながらこちらを見てうなずく。普通の人間に対してこのように敬意を払うのは、かなり名誉なことだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Una ceja rojiza se arquea ligeramente, parece que en señal de aprobación. Sin dejar de comer, te asiente. Para un{mf||a} human{mf|o|a} normal, este reconocimiento es todo un honor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A red brow quirks upward slightly — in approval, it seems. Without breaking off from his meal, he nods at you. For an ordinary human, such a show of regard is a high honour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una ceja rojiza se arquea ligeramente, parece que en señal de aprobación. Sin dejar de comer, te asiente. Para un{mf||a} human{mf|o|a} normal, este reconocimiento es todo un honor. Vuelve a asentir, permitiéndote levantarte.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Il lève un sourcil roux, apparemment en signe d'approbation. Sans même prendre la peine d'interrompre son repas, il vous adresse un signe de tête. Pour un humain ordinaire, une telle démonstration de respect est un immense honneur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A red brow quirks upward slightly — in approval, it seems. Without breaking off from his meal, he nods at you. For an ordinary human, such a show of regard is a high honour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il lève un sourcil roux, apparemment en signe d'approbation. Sans même prendre la peine d'interrompre son repas, il vous fait un signe de tête. Pour un humain ordinaire, une telle démonstration de respect serait déjà un immense honneur, mais il ne s'arrête pas là et hoche de nouveau la tête pour vous donner l'autorisation de vous lever.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Eine rote Augenbraue wandert leicht nach oben – zustimmend, wie es scheint. Ohne seine Mahlzeit zu unterbrechen, nickt er dir zu. Für einen gewöhnlichen Menschen ist das eine große Ehre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A red brow quirks upward slightly — in approval, it seems. Without breaking off from his meal, he nods at you. For an ordinary human, such a show of regard is a high honour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine rote Augenbraue wandert leicht nach oben – zustimmend, so scheint es. Ohne seine Mahlzeit zu unterbrechen, nickt er dir zu. Für einen gewöhnlichen Menschen ist das eine große Ehre. Mit einem erneutet Nicken bedeutet er dir großzügig, dass du dich erheben darfst.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Kızıl bir kaş, onaylar gibi görünerek hafifçe yukarı kalkıyor. Yemeğine ara vermeden seni başıyla selamlıyor. Sıradan bir insan için böylesi bir hürmet gösterisi, büyük bir onur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A red brow quirks upward slightly — in approval, it seems. Without breaking off from his meal, he nods at you. For an ordinary human, such a show of regard is a high honour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kızıl bir kaş, onaylar gibi görünerek hafifçe yukarı kalkıyor. Yemeğine ara vermeden seni başıyla selamlıyor. Sıradan bir insan için böylesi bir hürmet gösterisi, büyük bir onur.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
